description: The fast-food chain will start the service in a number of branches across the country in June. It is expected that companies such as Deliveroo, Just Eat or Uber Eats will be used.
title: McDonald’s is to launch a DELIVERY service
title_page: McDonald’s is to launch a DELIVERY service | Daily Mail Online
text:
McDonald's is set to launch a delivery service in Britain this summer.
The fast-food chain will start the service in a number of branches across the country in June.
It is expected that companies such as Deliveroo, Just Eat or Uber Eats will be used to carry out the deliveries.
The fast-food chain will start the service in a number of branches across the country in June
A McDonald's spokesman told The Sun: 'It is no secret we have been looking at the potential of delivery in recent months.
'This service is offered in other markets around the world and its growth within the UK, continues to gather pace.
'Listening to our customers, we know that this is a route they would like us to explore, and I can confirm that we are looking to launch a small delivery pilot this summer.'
A McDonald's app is also set to be launched at the same time as the delivery service in June this year.
